features: ONE CLEANER TO RULE THEM ALL - Rather than use separate cleaners for leather, vinyl, plastic, carpet, cloth, glass, and wood, Chemical Guys developed Total Interior Cleaner & Protectant; with just one product, you can now clean and protect virtually all interior surfaces!

SIMPLIFY YOUR DETAILING ARSENAL - Save time and money with one do-it-all product; keep your interior fresh, clean, and looking like new; clean without worrying about damaging surfaces; clean and protect nav and touch screens too!

MIST ON, WIPE OFF - Total Interior Cleaner & Protectant offers professional grade results and is so easy to use! Just mist on and wipe off! The unique formula contains blockers that help shield interior car parts from harsh sunlight to help prevent cracking and fading on hard plastics.

DRY-TO-THE-TOUCH FORMULA - The premium formula wipes clean, finishes residue free, and leaves no greasy or oily feel or look behind; Total Interior Cleaner & Protectant does not add extra gloss or shine; it only restores the stock appearance to the cleaned surface. Always test surface area first

THE GO TO BRAND IN CAR CARE - Beginners and professionals alike choose Chemical Guys, not only for the finest car care products, but the world class customer support and vast detailing knowledge Chemical Guys is more than a brand it's a lifestyle with a worldwide following
Applicable Finishes: Glass, Plastic, Rubber, Stainless Steel, Metal, Aluminum
body.description: Total Interior Cleaner & Protectant is the one product for cleaning and protecting virtually every car interior surface. Everybody loves a clean interior, but not everyone has time to figure out how to clean all the different surfaces correctly. Total Interior Cleaner & Protectant is the first detailing product that's formulated gentle enough to clean any hard, soft, Clear, or shiny interior surface. Clean the windshield to crystal-clarity, wipe dust off the dashboard, and remove body oils and grime from leather seats and upholstery. Remove light dirt and stains from carpets and floor mats, clean soda from cup holders, and erase fingerprints from navigation screens and wood dashboard trim. Help prevent cracking and fading on dashboard plastics, door panels, cup holders, center consoles, and sun visors. For quick cleanups of every interior surface, choose Chemical Guys Total Interior Cleaner & Protectant.How To Use:1. Mist product directly into cleaning towel to avoid overspray2. Wipe up dirt & grime with a microfiber towel, or agitate filth from cloth, carpet, and upholstery with a soft detailing brush3. Buff away streaks or blot fabrics dry with a separate clean microfiber towelFollow same steps for use on GPS, LCD screens of various kinds, clear plastics, navigation screens and in-car electronics (ICE)As always, we recommend testing this product in a small area before first useWorks safely on all automotive vehicle brands including: Acura, Audi, BMW, Buick, Cadillac, Chevrolet (Chevy), Chrysler, Dodge, Fisker, Ford, GMC, Honda, Hummer, Hyundai, Infiniti, Isuzu, Jaguar, Jeep, Kia, Land Rover, Lexus, Lincoln, Mazda, Mercedes, Mercury, Mini, Mitsubishi, Nissan, Pontiac, Porsche, RAM, Saab, Subaru, Tesla, Toyota, Volkswagen, and Volvo; and RV brands like Coachmen, Entegra, Forest River, Newmar, Thor Motor Coach, Winnebago, AirStream, K-Z, Keystone and Midwest Automotive Designs

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: CLEAN VIRTUALLY ALL INTERIOR SURFACES Chemical Guys Total Interior Cleaner & Protectant is the one product for cleaning and protecting virtually every car interior surface. ONE PRODUCT CLEANS IT ALL Chemical Guys Total Interior Cleaner & Protectant is the first detailing product that’s formulated gentle enough to clean any hard, soft, clear, or shiny interior surface. REMOVE DIRT, GRIME, AND FINGER PRINTS Clean the windshield to crystal-clarity, wipe dust off the dashboard, and remove body oils and grime from leather seats and upholstery. EASY TO USE FORMULA EXTREME UV PROTECTION FORMULA The unique formula is also blended with UV blockers that help shield interior car parts from harsh sunlight. Help prevent cracking and fading on dashboard plastics, door panels, and more! FRESH BABY POWDER SCENT Enjoy the fresh scent of baby powder scent in every wipe. Clean, protect, and refresh your ride with an amazing scent using Total Interior!

More from the Total Interior Product Line Total Interior Wipes Special Interior Bundle Clean & Shine Kit Take Them With You The fast, easy and convenient way to clean, maintain and protect most surfaces Make Your Interior Look New CG's top leather products with Total Interior - the perfect match! 7 Piece Kit Clean your interior, exterior, wheels & tires and dash with this easy kit A Great Value Our wipes come in a mega 50 pack so you are getting more value than other wipes Not Just for Cars Leather Cleaner & Conditioner can be used on all leather surfaces. Makes a Great Gift Don't know what to get that car enthusiast in your life? This kit is it!

USE IT AT HOME, OFFICE SPACES, AND CAR Use Total Interior to clean many different surfaces around your house, garage, and car Now cleaning many different surfaces is made easy using Chemical Guys Total Interior! MAINTAIN OEM LOOK AND FEEL The premium formula wipes clean, finishes residue free, and leaves no greasy or oily feel or look behind. For quick cleanups of every interior surface, choose Total Interior Cleaner & Protectant. WONT STAIN OR ETCH SENSITIVE AREAS Remove light dirt and stains from carpets and floor mats, clean soda from cupholders, and erase fingerprints from navigation screens and wood dashboard trim. CLEAN AND PROTECT IN ONE STEP With just one product, detailers, weekend warriors, and car enthusiasts can now clean and protect interior surfaces to remove layers of dirt, grime, debris, and fingerprints, at home and office space. CLEAN NAVIGATION SCREENS FAST AND EASY Clean seats, dashboards, carpets, fabrics, metal, clear plastic, navigation screens, glass, windshields, door panels, wood dashboard trim, and more with Total Interior Cleaner. HELP PREVENT DISCOLORATION AND FADING Total Interior will protect the surfaces from cracking or discoloring over time. Clean and protect your interior today with Total Interior Cleaner And Protectant!

Use these accessories to achieve the perfect application! The Stranger Happy Ending Edgeless Towel Luxurious Silk Edging Conforms To Any Shape Clean and dust all tight cracks and crevices with the Stranger! Wipe Sensitive Areas Clean Pick up dirt, grime, and debris without scratching Short and Long Pile It offers two separate piles for the best cleaning possible. One Wash Mitt, Unlimited Uses Use it wet or dry to clean your entire ride fast and easy with the Stranger Perfect 16" x 16" size Fold it in 4s to achieve the maximum use out of the towel Scratch less Detailing Towel Clean your entire ride with piece in mind with this premium microfiber towel

More from Chemical Guys ProFlow Pressure Washer Mr. Pink Car Wash Soap Foaming Citrus Fabric Clean Maximum Power Generates up to 2030 PSI of high-pressure water to easily blast away debris An Amazon Favorite 40,000+ reviews don't lie - customers love Mr. Pink! Your Fabric Will Thank You Cleans cloth, carpet, upholstery and more Maximum Flow Maximum flow rate of 1.77 GPM makes quick work of heavy-duty cleaning Super Concentrated Just add 1-3 oz. of Mr. Pink to a 5 gallon wash bucket for an easy car wash Easy to Use No toxic chemicals, ammonia, bleach, color damaging deterrents or solvents

Where can I use Total Interior Cleaner & Protectant? Total Interior can be used in the interior surfaces of your car, office spaces, and even at home! Can I use Total Interior on navigation screens? Yes, you may use Total Interior on navigation screens to remove finger prints. Can I use Total Interior on glass? Yes, you may use it on glass as long as it is not tinted. What scent does Total Interior have? Total Interior has a fresh baby powder scent to it. I'm having issues with my Total Interior Cleaner & Protectant - who should I contact for help? Amazon's customer care can help with shipping issues, returns & replacements. If you are having technical issues with the product and need help using it or need replacement parts, contact the Chemical Guys Product Specialist Team thru the CG website.

Who We Are Join The Movement, Discover The Lifestyle, And Uncover The Culture Of Car Care Chemical Guys is more than a company, it’s a lifestyle. Join the movement and discover the culture of passion and dedication to all things car care that has garnered us a worldwide following. Learn to completely care for your vehicle and find the products you need to elevate your car from a lackluster ride to a statement that reveals your inner shine. Become a part of the Chemical Guys Family and uncover the true meaning of pride and passion!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice look and perfect "sheen"..
reviews.reviewText: I've been an avid detailer for 30 years. And I do love the chemicals aspect of it. I've tried many products, and the vast majority of them aren't very good. Mind you, I was starting out detailing back in the 80's, when you had a VERY limited amount of products to rely on (And yes, I remember the very first days of Armor-All when it would CRACK your dash.. Those days are, of course, long gone.But I have been a big fan of Chemical Guy's products, and have written many reviews on here about their other products.This Total Interior, I have to say, has met or exceeded my expectations.Tip and note: Always wear nitrile type gloves whenever using any chemicals for detailing, repair, etc A garage isn't complete without nitrile gloves and an air compressor.. Enough on that.First off, they say you can use it on glass, and this would replace a lot of other cleaners and protectants, I'm not sure I would use anything to clean glass other than Invisible Glass. I've tried them all, and to me, Invisible Glass is my go-to and ONLY glass cleaner.Secondly, this DOES have a UV protectant in it, which of course, led me to purchase this. I've said on here before that if you are going to take the time to detail, and make the effort, you should not waste your time with products (Especially interior products) that don't protect the interior from UV damage.. The sun is a killer on leather and plastic.. (And paint, over time).. So if you're going to use any products on your interior make sure they have UV protectants.Thirdly, they say you can use this on Leather. I for one, after working with it, probably wouldn't use it on my leather, I prefer some other products for that, and yes, don't bother using ANY leather treatment unless it has a UV protectant in it, or at least follow it up with something that DOES have a UV protectant. I personally wouldn't use this on my leather. I would use Chemical Guys' Sprayable Leather Cleaner and Conditioner (no UV protectant), and then follow it with Klasse Interior as the Klasse has a UV protectant. The Klasse is also a water based formula (The original was oil based) and it also helps to tighten the leather a bit too.. Those two in combination make a nice look.What's nice about this Total Interior Cleaner Protectant (TICP) is the way it goes on. You want to use a fairly deep piled Microfiber cloth to apply it. Pre wet the cloth with distilled water in a spray bottle.Spray the TICP generously on the interior doors and plastics. It works especially well cleaning off your armrests and control modules for windows, door locks. I would generously spray it on the door panels and work it in, but I would not spray it directly on my speaker grills or into the control buttons, you want to work around that. For those areas, after you do the general door panels, or interior, and then come back and spray on your towel, and then hit the specific areas.For the front dash, and the LCD screen, I sprayed onto my pre moistened towel, worked it in nicely, then I quickly grabbed another microfiber towel that didn't have a "pile" on it. Almost like those microfiber dishtowels. The reason why is when you go for that quick buff (And just a quick buff, that's all you need) you can and will create some static.. And when you create that static you'll break off peach fuzz off a piled microfiber cloth and it may stick due to the static. So use a microfiber towel with no pile on it and quickly buff it, you don't need much, this product is "hot" and dries fairly quickly, a couple swipes, that's it.I did get the baby oil scent, and it's reminiscent of that, but not too strong or overdone. A nice fragrance. It comes in a couple other scents.The final look is very nice, it's not a shine or a heavy sheen, it's in between the OEM flat look (When you first purchase a new car) and a light satin. Just enough sheen to spruce up the interior, but not like a basted turkey that looks greasy or oily. Just right.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works very well
reviews.reviewText: I bought this because it was a good deal and my last go to cleaner raised the price to $20 a bottle. This cleaner did surprisingly well! I thought my steering wheel of a new used car had UV damage. Turns out it just needed this cleaner and was the past owners grime. Cleaned the steering wheel and dash to looking new! Did great on the leather too. I kept a dry towel to wipe off any excess. There is a spray and stream selection on the bottle which was nice. I used the spray. I have the fresh scent and it was a nice smell and not overwhelming at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love the fragrance and it cleans well
reviews.reviewText: The very first thing I noticed was the fragrance, it wasn’t strong and it didn’t have any smell of detergent or strong chemicals. I love how it makes my car smell. Also, it did a good job cleaning the interior or my car. I will definitely buy it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cleans well . Lite fresh smell.
reviews.reviewText: Does well and drys without a greasy feel or shine. Perfect for my broncos interior and vinyl seat . Doe’s not remove water stains . Had a couple on my headrest and nope! But as a cleaner to remove dirt and dust and not look like you Vaseline’d your interior this works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This product works perfect for my 22 honda civic, gets all the stains/dirt off with ease, as well as leaving the surface nice and smooth not oily, as well as keeping it to the original shine. 10/10 would buy again the only issue i had was a bit of streaking on my infotainment screen.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to use as an interior cleaner for my car. The item arrived as described, the spray nozzle works fine, and I personally feel like it's a good value (size and price point). As far as its cleaning properties, I would say it does a good job. I've used this by spraying it onto a microfiber cloth, brush, and directly on some areas. I haven't used it on glass yet, but I imagine it would work well as intended.Now I purchased the scent "fresh" and it is absolutely AMAZING. I would say it's one of the best things I've ever smelled in my entire life. It's definitely a fresh and clean scent, and makes me think of how my car smelled when first purchased. I'm a little disappointed that the company doesn't offer hanging or vent air fresheners in the same scent.All around I would definitely recommend this to anyone thinking of purchasing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent cleaning product.
reviews.reviewText: Bought this to clean out my car and it does the job well. It's a little on the pricy side for a cleaner, but you do get your money's worth.It does a great job of cleaning screens and trim. You can also use it to clean the upholstery of your car.It doesn't leave a residue which is nice.Overall it's a great product, which you can buy on Amazon but also in retail stores that sell automotive cleaning products (they are a biggish brand)Worth the price and purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not worth the price
reviews.reviewText: The cherry scent is nice, but faint! It didn't work any better than any cheaper cleaner, or even water. I have a couple of spots on my leather seats where coffee has spilled. I'm talking dime-sized drips. This wouldn't even take those off. It works well for dust and works great on nav screens and plastic. It left a bit of a film on the inside of the windshield, but nothing too bad as I only notice it in direct sunlight. All in all, I'll use the rest of the bottle, but I wouldn't purchase again.Also, I ordered this and another product from the chemical guys. One bottle leaked in the box and had a cracked sprayer cap. I reached out to customer service and heard nothing back. I wound up having to decant into my own sprayer, but I lost a few ounces of fluid (i.e. $$$$), which sucks.
Nice cleaning product. I did a lot of research to find a good quality, SAFE cleaner. Very subtle scent.
Um produto que a energia é mais durável que os outros.

I like that I can use this on all surfaces of my vehicle and it leaves no residue or film. Cleans really well and leaves a faint pleasant scent. Have not tried it on glass but works on leather and plastic great!

Best interior car cleaner ever! I have OCPD, and therefore my vehicle must be perfectly spotless. I have tried EVERYTHING to clean my interior and nothing compares to this product. I am 100% satisfied and would recommend to anyone, I promise you won’t be disappointed. Spray wipe with a clean microfibre cloth. Done!

This is not very harsh product. Very mild but cleans well all items like dashboard, steering wheel, gear knob leather, door panels etc. Does not smell at all. Must have a bottle of this cleaner in car.
